remarks: The identity component is a subset of any open subgroup.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Sep-2015.)
statement:
tgpconcomp.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
tgpconcomp.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
tgpconcomp.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` G ) $.
tgpconcomp.s $e |- S = U. { x e. ~P X | ( .0. e. x /\ ( J |`t x ) e. Con ) } $.
tgpconcompss $p |- ( ( G e. TopGrp /\ T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ T e. J ) -> S C_ T ) $.
$d .0. x $.
$d G x $.
$d J x $.
$d X x $.
